Easter things to do: Where to eat, drink, and have a jazzy Easter in the Bay of Plenty https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/easter-things-to-do-where-to-eat-drink-and-have-a-jazzy-easter-in-丰盛湾/LBUMWKLXRBAXJJ6MCSUE466IRA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/easter-things-to-do-where-to-eat-drink-and-have-a-jazzy-easter-in-丰盛湾/LBUMWKLXRBAXJJ6MCSUE466IRA/ Carly GibbsA list of some of our favourite venues to raise your glass, dine and be entertained. Sat, 23 Mar 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Singer Mandy Meadows returned to Papamoa three years ago from London, where she undertook residencies in prestigious hotels such as The Savoy, Dorchester, and Rosewood Hotel. Her Easter performance at St Amand will be her first since welcoming her first child in February. She will be joined by Ben Wilcock (piano), Chris Williamson (guitar), and Jeremy Hantler / Paul Hoskin (drums). Photo / Chris Martin
